name: iPhone 16 Pro Max
description: Top-tier iPhone with luxury build, class-leading video, and reliable battery life.
camera_info: Four cameras including LiDAR; exceptional video and solid photo performance.

name: Galaxy S25 Ultra
description: Premium Android with S Pen, bright display, and strong all-round performance.
camera_info: Versatile system, better than many rivals but low-light photos lag behind.

name: Magic V3
description: Thinnest foldable with bright displays, durability, and premium experience.
camera_info: Great main camera; ultrawide and telephoto are hit-or-miss.

name: 14 Ultra
description: Premium camera-focused phone with excellent Dolby display and fast charging.
camera_info: Top-notch cameras with best-in-class video; average selfie performance.

name: Magic7 Pro
description: IP69 design, flagship display, fast charging, and solid camera system.
camera_info: Superb selfies; telephoto camera has limited dynamic range.

name: Find N5
description: Thin and elegant foldable with vibrant screens and great battery life.
camera_info: Main camera shines; ultrawide needs improvement.

name: Galaxy Z Fold6
description: Refined foldable with better cameras, battery, and performance over its predecessor.
camera_info: Better camera tuning than Z Fold5; versatile but not class-leading.

name: OnePlus 13
description: Fast charging, high refresh display, and good battery in a sleek design.
camera_info: Good overall; excellent portraits, but night shots trail competition.

name: Pixel 9 Pro
description: Clean Android experience with AI-powered features and reliable cameras.
camera_info: Great stills, especially portraits; video not as strong.

name: GT5 Pro
description: Affordable flagship killer with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and fast charging.
camera_info: Impressive for the price; good main camera, okay telephoto.

name: X100 Pro
description: Zeiss optics and outstanding night photography define this sleek phone.
camera_info: One of the best for low-light and portrait shots.

name: Edge 50 Ultra
description: Beautiful design, clean software, and competitive cameras for the price.
camera_info: Solid imaging across all sensors; night mode a bit soft.
